text: Georgi Khristov (born 28 April 1938) is a Bulgarian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Bulgaria Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ruse, Bulgaria
title: Georgi Khristov (gymnast)
